item.description:
On Wednesday, November 28th 2007, CNN will broadcast the YouTube debate with the Republicans.

Please come to Ron Paul 2008 HQ in New Hampshire and join in the fun! In addition to snacks and drinks, we'll have some packets to stuff and information to go over.

Please come around 7pm, the debate starts at 8pm.

Our office is located at 45 S Main St, Concord NH 03301. Our new phone number is 603-227-0131

Thanks, and we hope to see you there!
item.name: Debate Watching Party at HQ
